title: How to learn math modeling for biology - Quora

response.answer_text: Two great books are “Mathematical Biology” by Murray and “Mathematical Physiology” by Keener and Sneyd. They give an overview of most modeling concepts and sub fields in Math. Biology. There are other books which are nice too although most of them somewhat more specialized.
Murray’s book is well appreciated. I would learn time series as well, for instance here; Introduction to Time Series Analysis
